title: A Guide to Mindful Eating
description: Guide to Mindful Eating: an alternate cover editionQuality and Quantity of Food is directly related to our Health and State of MindWe can use food to help us recover from Stress and Disease.Not taking food seriously will eventually lead to Stress or/and Disease.Lot of us have problems with over-eating, eating too often, eating too little, eating junk food, food allergies, etc.A Guide to Mindful Eating is designed to empower you in your relationship to food, helping you become more aware and conscious of the body / mind connection to food. We have also prepared for you 45 delicious and healthy veggie recipes to help you build a healthy and nutritious diet.
author: Nataša Pantović
